org: UCLA COSMOS (CA Summer School for Mathematics & Science)

details.point: Gained proficiency in 20+ key machine learning mechanisms under mentorship of Prof. Hugh Tad Blair. Explored intersection of biological mechanisms and computing.
Developed ML problem-solving and data analysis skills by applying theoretical learnings to practical assignments.
Enhanced robot capabilities with computer vision and sensor integration, contributed to team software (particle filter localizer, time-optimal trajectory optimizer).
Developed progressive web app for TheBlueAlliance, modernizing the widely-used platform providing real-time access to 30 years of competition and team data.
Led subteams in design, manufacturing, and programming of FRC team robot while teaching new members about robot development.
Introduced 475+ 3rd-9th grade students to robotics, machine learning, programming, and 3D design.
Raised $5900+ to support local STEM education and children health foundations. Recruited 20+ academy mentors.
Self-taught electronic audio production, audio editing, musical composition, and music theory without any prior knowledge.
Developed expertise in advanced signal processing and manipulation, enabling the creation of high-quality, commercially viable tracks.
Amassed 300,000+ streams in 2 years by performing data-driven music promotion and optimizing music promotion strategies.
Refined debate argumentation skills and synthesized speeches to compete on an international level.
Competed in 20+ tournaments as member of 3/3550+ ranked NSDA program.
